title like '%' || #{title} || '%'

SELECT CODE AS "code", TITLE AS "title", CONTENTS AS "contents", WRITER AS "writer", REG_DATETIME AS "reg_datetime" FROM t_BOARD WHERE code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_BOARD (CODE, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REG_DATETIME) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(code + 1),1) FROM t_BOARD), #{title}, #{contents}, #{writer}, now())
mapper.update: update t_BOARD set title=#{title}, contents=#{contents} where code=cast(#{code} as numeric)
mapper.select: select * from ( select (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as rnum , A.CODE, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.WRITER, A.REG_DATETIME from ( select CODE, TITLE, CONTENTS, WRITER, REG_DATETIME from t_BOARD order by REG_DATETIME desc ) A LIMIT cast(#{page_end} as numeric) ) B where b.rnum >= cast(#{page_st} as numeric)
select count(*) as totalCount from t_BOARD
